publication.title: Optimizing Maintenance of Constraint-Based Database Caches
publication.jconf: Advances in Databases and Information Systems

publication.title: Examining the Performance of a Constraint-Based Database Cache
publication.jconf: International Database Engineering and Application Symposium
publication.abstract: Constraint-based database caching aims at correctly answering SQL query predicates from a local cache database by exploiting constraints that have previously been used in selecting sets of records to be cached from a remote database. In this paper, we take our first steps in look- ing at performance aspects of our prototype Adaptive Constraint-based Cache (ACCache), which is realized in

publication.title: Dynamische Konfiguration von Cache Groups beim Constraint-basierten Datenbank-Caching
